name: State Physical Activity and Nutrition (SPAN
objective: This program supports recipients to implement state and local nutrition and physical activity interventions that support healthy nutrition, safe and accessible physical activity, and breastfeeding within states and/or the District of Columbia.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
sub_agency_name: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

authorizations.text: This program is authorized under sections 301 and 317(k)(2) of the Public Health Service Act [42 USC 241(a) and 247(b)(k)(2), as amended].

rules_regulations: Regulations governing this program are indicated in 45 CFR 75.
